thread.title: Nice hotel and great location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel and great location - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ray M
title: Nice hotel and great location
text:
We had an enjoyable night here for an event nearby at The Royal Albert Hall.
The Aussie manageress was very welcoming.
The cosy bar here is really nice.
Two mins walk from Gloucester Road station.
Ten mins walk from Museums and The Royal Albert Hall.
Fifteen mins walk from Knightsbridge and Harrods.
